segments.text: you're finally here ! What took so long ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got stuck in traffic again . There was a terrible traffic jam near the Carrefour intersection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's always rather congested down there during rush hour . Maybe you should try to find a different route to get home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think it can be avoided , to be honest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: perhaps it would be better if you started taking public transport system to work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it's something that I'll have to consider . The public transport system is pretty good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it would be better for the environment , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I feel bad about how much my car is adding to the pollution problem in this city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: taking the subway would be a lot less stressful than driving as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: the only problem is that I'm going to really miss having the freedom that you have with a car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , when it's nicer outside , you can start biking to work . That will give you just as much freedom as your car usually provides .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's true . I could certainly use the exercise !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: so , are you going to quit driving to work then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , it's not good for me or for the environment .
segments.speaker: S2
